basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Kevin LaMarca, multilingual a software engineer based in NYC. I am proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Java and Spring Boot. I graduated Baruch College with a degree in corporate communciation, an amalgam of marketing, public relations and workplace communication. Before becoming a software engineer, I worked briefly as a English foreign language teacher and then pivoted into software engineering as I enjoyed the mentorship of teaching, but longed to continue learning as a student myself. In addition to English, I am also fluent in Italian and speak French and Spanish conversationally.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This project is a site that dynamically generates and calculates simulated sales data based on parameters that can be entered into a constructor function that outputs objects representing new store locations. Included is a form wherein the user can create new object instances which will update pre-existing data structures.

projects.title: City Explorers
projects.description: City Explorers is built with React that calls upon a geoData API to render maps of any location in the world that the user wishes to see.
